headline: Could SLB’s (SLB) New Name and Director Refresh Signal a Shift in Long-Term Strategy?
summary: On October 7, 2025, shareholders approved the amendment of SLB’s Articles of Incorporation to change the company’s name from Schlumberger N.V. to SLB N.V., and appointed Mamatha Chamarthi to the Board of Directors, reflecting updates to the company’s bylaws and corporate governance. This dual governance and branding shift may indicate ongoing evolution in corporate identity and leadership, which could be meaningful for stakeholders tracking SLB’s strategic direction. We’ll explore how the...
